name: Redouble AI
headline: Scale human-in-the-loop for AI workflows in regulated industries
description: Redouble AI is the solution to scale human-in-the-loop for AI workflows in regulated industries. Instead of having to rely on slow and expensive human reviewers, Redouble’s clients save 80% of staff costs and significantly improve the accuracy and quality of their outputs by integrating our tool into their workflows. Addressing an $11BN market, the company is already generating revenue with its first set of clients. The founders are two serial entrepreneurs (who have built successful companies in AI and health-tech respectively) and a data engineering veteran who has written more than 120 enterprise-grade software applications.

founders.name: Martin Bittner, Founder/CEO
founders.description: Martin Bittner is the Co-Founder & CEO of Redouble AI. Before that, he was the CEO of Arctoris, a pharma workflow automation company which he co-founded and led from inception to profitability. In terms of background, Martin is a physician-scientist, having obtained his MD from the University of Freiburg in Germany, and his DPhil in Oncology as a Rhodes scholar at the University of Oxford.

founders.name: Haotian Li, Founder
founders.description: Haotian received his training in physics and computational chemistry from Zhejiang University and New York University. In 2017 Haotian cofounded the AI drug discovery start-up Redesign Science as CTO, designed and built the internal computational pipeline that increased the high through put screening efficiency by 100X.

founders.name: Andrey Santrosyan, Founder
founders.description: Andrey has spent 25 years in data and software engineering across Novartis and several startups. Specializing in devising and executing holistic data and software strategies, he led the development of over 120 software, data and AI applications, contributing to the successful market introduction of seven pharmaceutical products

raw_markdown='[What We Do](https://redouble.ai/<#What-We-Do>)[Our Expertise](https://redouble.ai/<#Our-Expertise>)[Our Thesis](https://redouble.ai/<#Our-Thesis>)[Why Work With Us](https://redouble.ai/<#Why-Work-With-Us>)
[Book a Call](https://redouble.ai/<https:/calendly.com/haotian-li-redouble/intro-call-with-redouble-ai?month=2024-11>)
[![A white and orange logo with the words, backed by combinator.](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6723830e4d5f5cbcb9c62f9a/6729032eed8842c7818e9bc5_backedbY.webp)](https://redouble.ai/<https:/www.ycombinator.com/companies/redouble-ai>)
# Accelerate Your AI Deployment
Redouble AI plans, implements, and monitors production-grade Gen AI solutions for organizations across verticals. A YC-backed technology company of AI, data, software, and workflow automation veterans, we solve your business challenges and unlock the potential of AI for your organization
[Book a Call](https://redouble.ai/<https:/calendly.com/haotian-li-redouble/intro-call-with-redouble-ai?month=2024-11>)
## What We Do
Comprehensive AI solutions tailored to your business needs
### Comprehensive AI Development
Full cycle AI development: planning, implementation, evaluation, validation
### Real-Time Optimization
Continuous, automated fine-tuning and optimization on your company’s data
### Secure Deployment Options
Built for security: available in managed cloud or as on-premise deployment
### Full-Stack AI Support
From RAG conversational bots to autonomous agents
### Developer SDKs
SDKs in Python, JS, Java, etc for seamless integration into your existing stack
### Customizable Admin Dashboard
Manage and control access and permissions for your AI at the click of a button
### **Model selection & testing**
Select and benchmark the right base model (open source, commercial, internal) for your use cases
### Regulatory Compliance
Adherence with all relevant frameworks, external guidelines and internal policies
### Reliability and Dependability
Proven deployments in high-stakes scenarios and regulated industries
## Our Expertise
Redouble AI has unique expertise in the effective development and deployment of mission-critical AI solutions, is experienced with the world’s most powerful LLMs, and excels at leveraging its team and technology to accelerate the adoption of effective Gen AI solutions that directly improve your bottom-line.
![A person holding a tablet with a chart on it.](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6723830e4d5f5cbcb9c62f9a/67253e312fefae175803a53f_AI-powered.webp)
### AI-Powered Automation
Enhance workflows at scale using intelligent technology.
![A group of people sitting around a table with laptops.](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6723830e4d5f5cbcb9c62f9a/672533ba987ca86d1eb5a175_modern-equipped-computer-lab.webp)
### Cognitive Data Processing
Leverage AI to find, interpret, and manage data efficiently.
![A person typing on a laptop with icons coming out of it.](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6723830e4d5f5cbcb9c62f9a/67253e311c716c840baa137d_Intelligent.webp)
### Intelligent Integration
Seamlessly embed AI into your existing systems and workflows.
![A woman sitting in front of a laptop computer.](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6723830e4d5f5cbcb9c62f9a/67253e313e1df67782806bad_AI-that.webp)
### AI That Learns From You
Continuously enhance accuracy and quality using internal expertise.
## Our Thesis
Overcoming the challenges of scalable AI implementation
### [**Choosing Where to Start Your AI Journey**](https://redouble.ai/<#>)### [**Moving from Pilot to Production**](https://redouble.ai/<#>)### [**Tailored Solutions instead of Generic Options**](https://redouble.ai/<#>)### [**Continuous Learning for Improved Performance**](https://redouble.ai/<#>)
### **Choosing Where to Start Your AI Journey**
![A group of people sitting around a computer desk.](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6723830e4d5f5cbcb9c62f9a/672538c1a14f44fa753dfb42_the-challenges.webp)
The transformative potential of AI for top-line and bottom-line growth is readily recognized - yet, deciding where to start your AI journey is a daunting task that can be overwhelming. **Redouble AI** provides what is needed: clear guidance from an expert team of seasoned technologists and executives, who start by listening and understanding your business’s precise needs, requirements, and opportunities, before developing a thought-through plan of action.
### Moving from Pilot to Production
![A man in a suit is holding a blue and white circle with icons.](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6723830e4d5f5cbcb9c62f9a/672533bac43b1bfe147641d4_standard-quality-control-collage-concept.webp)
Some companies have already started pilot projects - and too often, they encounter challenges as they try to roll out AI at scale: model performance is inconsistent when moving from pilot to production and most AI solutions do not know when they are wrong, resulting in un-identified mistakes. **Redouble AI** addresses these challenges with a focus on production-grade AI solutions that put safety, dependability, and scalability first, leveraging our proprietary tech stack for fully integrated AI output validation, monitoring and quality control.
### Tailored Solutions instead of Generic Options
![A man in a suit touching a button on a touch screen.](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6723830e4d5f5cbcb9c62f9a/672533ba308a23ac8c3018d3_bussinessman-with-flowchat.webp)
Generic AI tools fail to address specific business goals: off-the-shelf solutions are incognizant of your specific business needs and requirements, and one-size-fits-all is not a viable strategy to implement AI in the enterprise. **Redouble AI** works differently. Our experienced team first analyzes your use cases and workflows in depth, understanding interdependencies, uncovering mission-critical insights, and then develops tailored AI solutions that perform at scale, creating a direct RoI for your organization.
### Continuous Learning for Improved Performance
![A group of people sitting around a table with laptops.](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6723830e4d5f5cbcb9c62f9a/672533ba987ca86d1eb5a175_modern-equipped-computer-lab.webp)
Effectively implementing and running an AI stack consistently across the enterprise is complex, as a lot of tacit and implicit knowledge is not accessible to most AI systems. **Redouble AI** ’s systems leverage the expert insight within your company. We learn from human reviewer feedback and provide real-time AI output validation, allowing you to selectively direct human reviewer attention where it makes a difference in a scalable way, while providing continuous model improvements for sustained and ever-increasing performance.
## Why Work With Us
Experience, proven results, and tailored AI solutions for your business
### Tailored Solutions for Your Unique Needs
A solution fully customized to your organization’s specific needs and requirements that solves your individual use cases
### Experienced AI & Engineering Team
An experienced team across (Gen) AI and software & data engineering, with a long track record of developing and implementing value-creating solutions in regulated industries
### Proven, Rapid ROI Across Industries
A proven offering with demonstrated, rapid RoI across different sectors, including healthcare, financial services, logistics, and others
### Real-Time Validation for Scalable AI
A unique technology platform developed specifically to provide real-time AI output validation and enable efficient scaling of mission-critical AI workflows
## Ready to Unlock the Full Potential of AI for Your Business?
Discover how Redouble AI can transform your operations with tailored AI solutions that drive real impact. Let’s discuss how we can meet your unique needs and accelerate your success.
[Book a Call](https://redouble.ai/<https:/calendly.com/haotian-li-redouble/intro-call-with-redouble-ai?month=2024-11>)

generated_description:
**Redouble AI: Transforming AI Workflows in Regulated Industries**

Redouble AI is a dynamic startup founded in 2024 and currently part of Y Combinator Batch S24. Headquartered in the heart of San Francisco, the company is on a mission to scale human-in-the-loop processes for AI workflows specifically tailored for regulated industries. 

Let’s talk numbers: Redouble AI targets an $11 billion market. Clients have noticed a staggering **80% reduction in staff costs** by integrating Redouble's tools into their operations. And more importantly, these tools significantly enhance the accuracy and quality of outputs, which is crucial in regulated sectors.

The team behind Redouble AI is a powerhouse mix of expertise. Co-founders are two seasoned entrepreneurs with successful backgrounds in AI and health-tech, complemented by a data engineering veteran who has developed over 120 enterprise-grade software applications. With a lean crew of three, they’re already making waves in their sector.

### What Redouble AI Offers

1. **Comprehensive AI Solutions**: From planning to production, they provide full-cycle AI development tailored specifically to the unique needs of businesses.
   
2. **Real-Time Optimization**: They don’t just set it and forget it; their tools continuously optimize your company's data.

3. **Secure Deployment**: With options for managed cloud or on-premise deployments, security is a foundational aspect of their offerings.

4. **Full-Stack AI Support**: Redouble offers everything from conversational bots to autonomous agents, ensuring that clients have access to the best tech available.

5. **Customizable Dashboards**: Manage your AI outputs with ease through a user-friendly admin dashboard.

6. **Regulatory Compliance**: They ensure adherence to all relevant frameworks, addressing one of the biggest concerns of companies operating in regulated environments.

### The Redouble AI Approach

They are not just another generic AI tool provider; Redouble AI emphasizes tailored solutions. Every business has unique challenges and objectives, and they pride themselves on understanding these intricacies deeply before crafting customized solutions. Whether it's navigating the complexities of moving from pilot projects to full-scale implementation or ensuring continuous learning to enhance performance, their expertise is unwavering.

### Why Engage with Redouble?

Choosing Redouble AI means opting for a partner with proven results and a commitment to enhancing your operational efficiency. Their technology platform uniquely supports real-time AI output validation, making scaling mission-critical AI workflows both reliable and effective. 

So, if you’re standing at the crossroads of deploying AI in your organization and feeling overwhelmed, **Redouble AI** provides the guidance and expertise needed to take the first step and propel your business into the future with confidence.

For more information or to explore how they can specifically help your organization, check out their [website](https://redouble.ai/) or book a call directly with their team. 

This is more than just technology; it’s about unlocking the potential of AI to earn tangible returns for your business.
